Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 9/1/1967, off Lawrence Parnell (PG)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/21/1968, off Everett Kuhl (MAN)...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/10/1972 to a 4-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1973, hitting .455 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from Pontiac to Capital City on 2/11/1974 (Going to PON: C J. Fussell, P S. Losada. Going to CC: 1B R. Tyler)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1974, hitting .464 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
